players names enter request: Enter the names of the players using a comma as a separator:
min2: At least two names :) Come on again:
enter usernames: Enter the names of the players:
proceed to settings: Great, you can go to the settings.
choose levels: In this menu you need to choose categories of questions and actions for the game.
mode:
Select the game mode. There are two of them. 

 'Free' - everyone chooses when the truth is, and when the action. 

 Alternately - the bot will alternate the truth and action one time.
players, level and mode!: First you need to add players, choose the level and mode of the game!.
game over: The game is over, questions/actions are over. Click a new game
penalty: It looks like you have five failures in a row, you have a fine.
